page.title: 11Collingbourne Area Ghosts
page.content: Collingbourne Kingston boasts the legend of a black dog with fiery eyes that lives in Collingbourne Woods and punishes wrong do-ers. It's first victims were two robbers who killed an old couple on the Bath Highway and chased by the neighbours tried to take refuge in the wood. People in Everleigh tell of a man who once a year is seen in Everleigh Woods measuring the Sarson Stones. Because of this he is known locally as the "Man who Measures". Also at the Crown at Everleigh doors open in front of you as if by unseen hands and you are led to a room with no other exit and there is never anyone there. This is supposed to be where a woman had been murdered.
